home.text0: Eight-water, voda za sve vaše potrebe, a najprije zdravlje
home.text1: Naša prirodna voda dolazi iz srca Bosne i Hercegovina. U planinama srednje bosne se nalazi veliki broj najkvalitetnijih izvora iz kojih se snadbjevaju svi naši proizvodi. Osim iznimnog kvaliteta ova prirodna izvorska voda nudi i velike benefite za vaše zdrvalje. Naša kompanije je osnovana 2011 godine sa ciljem da ove prirodne blagodati ponudi ljudima diljem Bosne i Hercegovine, ali i svijeta. Naši kupci dolaze iz raznih zemalja u Evropi, Aziji i Africi. Nudim veliki broj proizvoda, ali također radimo i specijalizovane proizvode prilagođene vašim potrebama. Bez obzira gdje, kome i kako dostavljamo našu voda - njen kvalitet je uvijek neupitan.
home.text7: Naš izvor izvorskog izvora Husica Vrelo nalazi se u Bugojnu, gradu i općini koji se nalazi u srednjoj Bosni. Izvori rastopljeni od snega i leda na vrhu planine konvergiraju se pod zemljom, krećući se duž rupa i pukotina u bazaltu.
home.text9: Minimalni postupak filtriranja služi samo za uklanjanje sitnih čestica, a korisne minerale ostavlja netaknut. Voda se nikada ne tretira hemikalijama ili bilo čim što utječe na kvalitetu vode. Osma izvorska voda je čista, hrskava i ima ukusan okus. Izuzetno je osvježavajuće i sadrži toliko korisnih korisnih minerala.
home.text12: Kvalitet, sigurnost i stabilan izvor vode
home.text13: Istraživanje stabilnosti vode nakon flaširanja provodi se za potrebe projekta proizvodnje vode u bocama iz izvora 'Husica vrelo' -Duboka. Ovo je prikazano u istraživanju kvalitete, stabilnosti i mogućnosti flaširanja izvorske vode 'Husica vrelo'-Duboka', a rezultati pokazuju da je voda stabilna i prikladna za flaširanje. Ti se podaci koriste u ovoj predistraživanju o ekonomskoj opravdanosti. Rezultati istraživanja pokazuju da tijekom određenog vremenskog perioda ne dolazi do promjene koncentracije komponenti koje su prisutne u vodi i nema kemijskih procesa i procesa transformacije, nema promjene boje ili taloženja. Stoga se može zaključiti da je voda stabilna u definiranom vremenu istraživanja i preporučljiva za flaširanje u PET (plastičnu) i staklenu ambalažu.
home.text5: Osam znakova zbog kojih biste mogli patiti od iscrpljenosti topline:
home.text4:
1. Vrtoglavica 
2. Mučnina i povraćanje 
3. Suha usta 
4. Glavobolja 
5. Umor ili slabost 
6. Jako znojenje 
7. Hladna, blijeda i ljepljiva koža 
8. Brza, slaba puls
home.text14: Eight water is being produced in Aqua Valley facility near town of Bugojno. Located in valley and completely surrounded by nature only best results are posible here. Not only we produce our products here, but also take insiparition from this untouched gree world all around us. You can see more

about.descrT1: Our company takes best from nature, and only way to do that is to be in best of nature. Because of that, one of our facilities is located as close to water source as possible. There is anything but nature all around us
about.descrT2: If you wana see more from this green world look at these pictures
about.descrH3: Water source Husić Vrelo Duboka, Bugojno
about.descrT3:
The location of the source of the Husic water spring is Deep in the municipality of Bugojno, SBK-Central Bosnia Canton, Federation of BiH and is 6 km away from the town of Bugojno. The mentioned source is, in hydrogeological sense, an overflow of a large karst reservoir and is located in the area of ​​karst massifs. The specificity of this source is the mechanism of springs, that is, the appearance of water at the source itself, so that water can be drunk directly from the source, without any further technological processes. It is a catchment area that is uninhabited, so access is very convenient, as is the environment of the well itself. In terms of abundance ie. the amount of water flow, so far, tests have shown that the minimum water flow is about 211 liters per second. There was a slight change in the water yield depending on the season, which indicates that the relative stability of the source means that the water flows from greater depths to which there is no significant influence of atmospheric water, which appears to a greater or lesser extent. This means that the average water flow of a spring of 200 liters per second can be discussed. Furthermore, the water from this source is of high quality in terms of its chemical and microbiological characteristics, bearing in mind the following:

- the content of substances in water, especially nitrates found in low concentrations and nitrites whose concentrations are below the limit of study, make this water extremely high quality and suitable for drinking,
- water that contains minimal amounts of chloride, sulfate, nitrite and phosphate, and the organic matter is present in negligible concentrations,
- the content of heavy metals in this water is very low, far below the maximum permissible limit values,
- from the point of view of the presence of pathogenic microorganisms, the water is hygienically correct.

 The results of water testing so far have shown that with the time of standing of water there are no chemical processes, that is, the change of water color and the appearance of sediment, so it can be concluded that the water is stable and very suitable for bottling. Considering all of the above, it can be concluded that the water from the Husić spring is of high quality, it is stable after bottling and that it fulfills all the conditions regulated by the current regulations on natural spring waters and the health of the water
